abstract: NHL Roundup; Los Angeles Kings beat New Jersey Devils, 3-1; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Anze Kopitar had a goal and two assists for Los Angeles, which is fighting for a playoff spot and faces a five-game road swing.

headline.main: Kings Start Important Trip With Victory Over Devils
headline.print_headline: Kings Start Important Trip With Victory Over Devils

snippet: Anze Kopitar had a goal and two assists for Los Angeles, which is fighting for a playoff spot and faces a five-game road swing.
